itemInfo.itemDesc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Metal Solvent acquired by Alchemy and Copper Ingots. It requires the knowledge of Heating: Skilled.

※ Find Vatudun in Keplan and complete the Materials for Skills Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the related Quest, achieve Gathering Professional Level 10 and Processing Professional Level 5. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Copper Ingot
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Melted Copper Shards. It requires the knowledge of Heating: Beginner.

※ Find Flaviano in Heidel and complete the Pure Water for an Experiment Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Apprentice Level 4 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Metal Solvent
item.desc: A material used to change metals into a pure crystal form through Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained through Alchemy.

item.name: Bronze Dagger
item.desc: A dagger cast in bronze.

item.name: Parrying Dagger
item.desc: A dagger made for parrying attacks.

item.name: Helrick Talisman
item.desc: A talisman with a magical gemstone embedded in it.

item.name: Rhik Talisman
item.desc: A talisman with enhanced defensive abilities.

item.name: Azwell Staff
item.desc: A staff custom-made for the commander of the Militia.

item.name: Shabby Wagon Badge
item.desc:
A banner for a wagon.

- Can be Installed on: Wagon

It can be enhanced with a Black Stone (Armor).

item.name: Ultimate Azwell Staff
item.desc:
An Azwell staff at its maximum potential.
It has a low chance of being crafted when upgrading a Azwell staff.

- Restore Max Durability: Azwell Staff of Crimson Flame, Azwell Staff of Destruction, Azwell Staff of Temptation, Azwell Staff

item.name: Azwell Staff of Temptation
item.desc:
The energy of Temptation is contained within this Azwell Staff.
It can be developed by Refining a common Azwell Staff.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Azwell Staff of Temptation, Azwell Staff

item.name: Azwell Staff of Destruction
item.desc:
The energy of Destruction is contained within this Azwell Staff.
It can be developed by Refining a common Azwell Staff.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Azwell Staff of Destruction, Azwell Staff

item.name: Azwell Staff of Crimson Flame
item.desc:
The energy of Crimson Flame is contained within this Azwell Staff.
It can be developed by Refining a common Azwell Staff.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Azwell Staff of Crimson Flame, Azwell Staff

item.name: Balenos Fishing Rod
item.desc: Balenos fishing rod. It shortens the auto-fishing time.\nCan be enhanced with Blackstone (Weapon).

item.name: Azwell Shortsword
item.desc: A Shortsword custom-made for the commander of the Militia.
